Package com.cafean.client.ui.tools

Class ConnectMouseHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.cafean.client.ui.tools.MouseHandler
      • com.cafean.client.ui.tools.ConnectMouseHandler
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.event.ActionListener, java.awt.event.MouseListener, java.awt.event.MouseMotionListener, java.util.EventListener
    public class ConnectMouseHandler
extends MouseHandler
implements java.awt.event.ActionListener
    A MouseHandler for Connection events on the ZoomablePanel

    • Field Summary

      Modifier and Type Field Description

      • getButtonIcon

        public javax.swing.ImageIcon getButtonIcon()
